channel.title: SplitPk~2 Worlds and G.E. Brand New Server!
channel.description:
Welcome back to; SplitPK!
That's right! We are back. Ethan has decided to re-launch this amazing server. Same source, same gameplay.
We focus on both good gameplay and a good community.
Some of our features:
- 100 percent g.e. custom interfaces - 2 Worlds! Easy pk and Eco - Fair economy - 22 fully working skills! - Farming with herbs! - 8 bosses - Corporal Beast drops chaotics and Nex armours! - 110 percent working party room - Sweet staff - Marketplace with spreaded shops, no line-ups! - Dicing - Tons of different pickable display icons! - Custom loyalty titles! - Free stat resetting! - Polypore staff! - Aspicious Katana! - Dragon Kiteshield! - Dragonbone Mage and Melee sets! - ALL chaotics and primals! - Extreme potions! - Custom vote shop! http://prntscr.com/1m4tlr - Pk artifacts! - Rewarding gameplay! - Fair xp rates! - And ALOT more
Come take a look! http://split-pk.com/
Screenshots~
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hCrNfXi.png[/img] Login [img]http://i.imgur.com/JFjlN3h.png[/img] Starter [img]http://i.imgur.com/cXO06uV.png[/img] Info-Tab [img]http://i.imgur.com/d2hXQB9.png[/img] Rank Icon Changing [img]http://i.imgur.com/3zFvbV2.png[/img] Loyalty~Titles [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/6931/mikk.png[/img] Name Changing [img]http://i.imgur.com/qD4OYOP.png[/img] Donator Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/PQ4Lc0J.png[/img] Vote point Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/wxnMdnm.png[/img] Grand~Exchange! [img]http://i.imgur.com/C0OeeXl.png[/img] In~Game Highscores!
That is just some of our features at SplitPK, Come check us out, We would be glad to have you :)
~Thanks you for your time ~Ethan

item.title: SplitPk~2 Worlds and G.E. Brand New Server!
item.dc:creator: @pumpklins pumpklins
item.description:
@pumpklins wrote:

Welcome back to; SplitPK!

That’s right! We are back. Ethan has decided to re-launch this amazing server.
Same source, same gameplay.

We focus on both good gameplay and a good community.

Some of our features:

  • 100 percent g.e. custom interfaces
  • 2 Worlds! Easy pk and Eco
  • Fair economy
  • 22 fully working skills!
  • Farming with herbs!
  • 8 bosses
  • Corporal Beast drops chaotics and Nex armours!
  • 110 percent working party room
  • Sweet staff
  • Marketplace with spreaded shops, no line-ups!
  • Dicing
  • Tons of different pickable display icons!
  • Custom loyalty titles!
  • Free stat resetting!
  • Polypore staff!
  • Aspicious Katana!
  • Dragon Kiteshield!
  • Dragonbone Mage and Melee sets!
  • ALL chaotics and primals!
  • Extreme potions!
  • Custom vote shop! http://prntscr.com/1m4tlr
  • Pk artifacts!
  • Rewarding gameplay!
  • Fair xp rates!
  • And ALOT more

Come take a look!
http://split-pk.com/
